001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.RelationalDbClient;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector.BaseDbConnectorService;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.QueryResponse;
007import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
008
009/**
010 * Enhances {@code RelationalDbClient} with Allure reporting.
011 *
012 * <p>This class extends {@link RelationalDbClient} to integrate Allure logging,
013 * ensuring SQL query execution details are captured in test reports.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017public class RelationalDbClientAllure extends RelationalDbClient {
018
019   /**
020    * Constructs a new {@code RelationalDbClientAllure} instance with the specified connector and
021    * database configuration.
022    *
023    * @param connector The database connection service.
024    * @param dbConfig  The database configuration details.
025    */
026   public RelationalDbClientAllure(final BaseDbConnectorService connector, final DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
027      super(connector, dbConfig);
028   }
029
030   /**
031    * Logs the executed SQL query using Allure reporting.
032    *
033    * <p>This method overrides the parent implementation to include Allure step-based logging,
034    * ensuring that query execution details are captured in test reports.
035    *
036    * @param query The SQL query being executed.
037    */
038   @Override
039   protected void printQuery(final String query) {
040      super.printQuery(query);
041      Allure.step(String.format("Executing SQL query: %s", query));
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Logs the query execution response details with Allure reporting.
046    *
047    * <p>This method overrides the parent implementation to attach the executed SQL query,
048    * execution duration, and query results (if available) to Allure reports.
049    *
050    * @param query    The executed SQL query.
051    * @param response The query response containing results.
052    * @param duration The execution duration in milliseconds.
053    */
054   @Override
055   protected void printResponse(final String query, final QueryResponse response, final long duration) {
056      super.printResponse(query, response, duration);
057      Allure.step(String.format("Finished executing query in %dms", duration), () -> {
058         addAttachmentIfPresent("Executed SQL", query);
059         addAttachmentIfPresent("Duration (ms)", String.valueOf(duration));
060
061         if (!response.getRows().isEmpty()) {
062            addAttachmentIfPresent("Result Rows", response.toString());
063         }
064      });
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Adds an attachment to Allure reports if the provided content is not empty.
069    *
070    * @param name    The attachment name.
071    * @param content The content to be attached.
072    */
073   private void addAttachmentIfPresent(String name, String content) {
074      if (content != null && !content.trim().isEmpty()) {
075         Allure.addAttachment(name, content);
076      }
077   }
078
079}
